title: Geotechnical Survey Data Analysis
description: A project engineer needs to analyze a geotechnical survey report to determine foundation requirements for wind turbines.

tasks.description: Extract key soil properties (e.g., soil type, bearing capacity, liquefaction potential) from the uploaded survey report PDF.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly extracts and tabulates the specified soil parameters.

tasks.description: Compare the site's soil bearing capacity against the turbine manufacturer's foundation requirements.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the native soil meets the minimum requirements.

tasks.description: Recommend the most suitable foundation type (e.g., gravity, monopile) based on the analysis.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a justified recommendation for the foundation design.
